titles.title: Native American Health Savings Improvement Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit individuals eligible for Indian Health Service assistance to qualify for health savings accounts.
Native American Health Savings Improvement Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Native American Health Savings Improvement Act
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals who are eligible for a medical care program of the Indian Health Service or a tribal organization to participate in health savings accounts.
